case.name: Elecon Australia Pty Ltd v Brevini Australia Pty Ltd [2009] FCA 1327 (17 November 2009)

citances.sentence:
"
[62] See Plaintiff's Submissions, [28]-[31] (referring to Moorgate Tobacco Co Ltd v Philip Morris Ltd [1984] HCA 73 ; (1984) 156 CLR 414 at 437---8 (Deane J); Breen v Williams (1995-1996) 186 CLR 71 at 126-9 (Gummow J); and Dean The Law of Trade Secrets and Personal Secrets (LBC (2 nd ed) 2002), pp 54-6 [2.140]-[2.150]). [63] Plaintiff's Submissions, [32]-[37] (referring to TS & B Retail Systems Pty Ltd v 3Fold Resources Pty Ltd and Others (No. 3) [2007] FCA 151 at [75] (Finkelstein J); and Elecon Australia Pty Ltd v Brevini Australia Pty Ltd [2009] FCA 1327 ; (2009) 263 ALR 1 at [261] and [262] (Buchanan JA). [64] Plaintiff's Submissions, [38]-[41]. [65] See Plaintiff's Submissions, [41] (set out above).
